content: this is a free pattern and video tutorial for a granny square cardigan finished size chest 36 42 48 54 60 upper arm 12 14 16 18 20 length 18 21 24 27 30 i will show you how to determine the sizes of the squares you need as well as the layout and placement that i use i will also guide you through alterations that you can make to improve the overall fit of the cardigan lastly i will go through step-by-step tutorials on finishing details such as sleeve cuffs and button bands please note that the instructions and specific sizes and gauge given are to be used as a guideline you may change the size of your squares and add options to the cardigan to fit your desired size
